plot: After learning that her recently deceased Bubbe left her a large sum of money, Jessie discovers that in order to get the cash she must live Jewish for a year.
plot_en: After learning that her recently deceased Bubbe left her a large sum of money, Jessie discovers that in order to get the cash she must live Jewish for a year.
plot_es: After learning that her recently deceased Bubbe left her a large sum of money, Jessie discovers that in order to get the cash she must live Jewish for a year.
title: Dude, Where's My Chutzpah?
